text:

name: A Plastic Planet
text:
@PlasticsWorld @CocaCola_EU @sascampaigns @plasticsoupfoun @Greenpeace @Seasaver @seashepherd @mcsuk @UNEP @OceanaEurope @SkyOceanRescue I‚Äôm afraid you are. Many brands have been using rPET for years, it‚Äôs not new. Yet we find these rPET bottles during ocean recovery and beach cleans too.  

There are constant audits, and plans to join up all the beach clean audit data will give us a more detailed analysis.

My favorite bird
a Gannet
ever majestic
wild
now no more 

drowned
in seawater
tangled up
in man-made plastic

there you lay
washed up
for my feet
looking
in my sad eyes.

at the cliffs
I burried you
stone by stone
rest in peace. 

AFdK
7-12-2019

name: A Plastic Planet
